name: chronos
description: If you have a meeting, greek god (Chronos) will remind you.

scripts.parcel:dev: rm -rf build && npm run copy:main && parcel ./src/renderer/index.html -d build/renderer/
scripts.parcel:prod: rm -rf build && npm run copy:main && parcel build ./src/renderer/index.html -d build/renderer/ --public-url ./ --no-source-maps
scripts.parcel:prod:treeshake: rm -rf build && npm run copy:main && parcel build ./src/renderer/index.html -d build/renderer/ --public-url ./ --no-source-maps --experimental-scope-hoisting
scripts.release: rm -rf release && npm run parcel:prod && build --dir --x64 --publish=never

author: Filip Vitas
